trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> objects.

trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref>物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataColumnMapping" name="DataColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object that was added to the collection.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataColumnMapping" name="DataColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object that was added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataColumnMapping" name="DataColumnMapping" href=""> </xref>物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array>要加入至集合。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.target: 移除所有<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref>從集合的物件。

trans-unit.target: 中以零為起始的索引`array`由此開始複製。

trans-unit.target: 取得數目<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref>, source column name, and <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref>指定<xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"> </xref>，來源資料行名稱，和<xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> exists in the collection, it is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>存在於集合中傳回。</xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> does not exist in the collection, for a given <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>, the following actions occur: |MissingMappingAction|Action Taken| |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|Creates a <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> with the specified source column name as both the source column name and the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> column name.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>不存在於集合中，為給定的<xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>，執行下列動作: |MissingMappingAction |採取動作 | |--------------------------|------------------| |`Passthrough`|建立<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>指定之來源的資料行名稱與來源資料行名稱和<xref:System.Data.DataSet>資料行名稱。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> </xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping> is not added to the collection.| |`Error`|An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is generated if the specified column mapping is missing.| |`Ignore`|Gets a null value.|
trans-unit.target: 此<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>不會加入至集合。 | |`Error`|如果遺漏指定的資料行對應，就會產生<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。 | |`Ignore`|取得值，null 值。 |</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping>

trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The case-sensitive source column name to find.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的區分大小寫的來源資料行名稱。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: The mappingAction parameter was set to , and no mapping was specified.
trans-unit.target: mappingAction 參數已設為 ，但未指定任何對應。

trans-unit.target: 要對應的資料行的資料類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否存取<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>是同步 （安全執行緒）。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>介面。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果存取<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>是同步 （安全執行緒），否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
